data.title: Dreamless Veil sign to Relapse Records, announce debut album and share new single
data.meta_description: Dreamless Veil has signed with Relapse Records and announced their debut album, Every Limb of the Flood, set for release on September 20, 2024. Pre-order Every Limb of the Flood here. Featuring members of ...
data.text:
Dreamless Veil has signed with Relapse Records and announced their debut album, Every Limb of the Flood, set for release on September 20, 2024.

Pre-order Every Limb of the Flood here.

Featuring members of Inter Arma, Artificial Brain, and Psycroptic, Dreamless Veil delivers terrifying Blackened Extreme Metal, promising one of the year's most haunting releases. The band is composed of Artificial Brain guitarist Dan Gargiulo, Inter Arma/Artificial Brain vocalist Mike Paparo, and Psycroptic drummer Dave Haley.

Every Limb of the Flood was recorded by Brett Bamberger (Revocation), mixed by Gargiulo, and mastered by Colin Marston (Gorguts, Krallice, and more.)

The trio has delivered the debut single from the album, "A Generation Of Eyes", as a preview of the album to come.

Pre-order Every Limb of the Flood here.
